name: Space Bricks
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a Brick in Space?! Well do I have the ultra-realistic simulator for YoOoUuuuuu!

Nah, it's just a puzzle. Get the end and all that basic ish. Just don't fall off the floating space floor or else you'll have to.. start over? I guess?? =P

This game was made for a Dev Jam: 'Resurrect an Old Project Etc. Jam'
I found out about this Jam with only a few days to spare, so I decided to pick up this old puzzle game that I started several years ago, refactored two handfuls of times, and ultimately never finished. But THIS TIME!!! it's short... but it's a thing XD

TooMuch2Do Productions is a small team of me (Steven French) and muh boi Zack Marti(a)n. We are pretty dope, but new to the scene.
Definitely keep an eye out for more from TM2D!! -- We bring the PIKSELS!
